ValidationRule.description: FID Notes required when status = received
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Received"), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-01-01"), CONTAINS( Coverages__c , "Fiduciary Liability"), ISBLANK( Fiduciary_Coverages_Notes__c ))
